statements: SELECT * FROM RegulatoryChanges WHERE id = 1
SELECT company_name, regulatory_body FROM RegulatoryChanges WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryChanges WHERE regulation_change_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT regulatory_body, company_name FROM RegulatoryChanges WHERE compliance_status = FALSE
SELECT id, company_name, regulatory_body, compliance_status FROM RegulatoryChanges
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryChanges WHERE regulatory_body='FDA' AND compliance_status=true;
SELECT id, company_name, regulation_change_date FROM RegulatoryChanges WHERE compliance_status=false ORDER BY regulation_change_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, regulatory_body FROM RegulatoryChanges WHERE regulation_change_date > '2021-01-01' AND compliance_status=true;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_changes FROM RegulatoryChanges WHERE regulation_change_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT MAX(regulation_change_date) AS latest_change_date, MIN(regulation_change_date) AS earliest_change_date FROM RegulatoryChanges WHERE compliance_status=true;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes;
SELECT company_name, regulatory_description FROM regulatory_changes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT company_name FROM regulatory_changes;
SELECT * FROM compliance_status WHERE regulatory_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT company_name, last_checked FROM compliance_status ORDER BY last_checked DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' AND compliance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT regulatory_description, company_name FROM regulatory_changes WHERE regulatory_description LIKE '%new%';
SELECT id, regulatory_description, compliance_date FROM regulatory_changes ORDER BY compliance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_status WHERE regulatory_status = 'Compliant' AND last_checked > '2022-02-01';
SELECT company_name, regulatory_status FROM compliance_status ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, change_description FROM regulatory_changes WHERE id > 10;
SELECT regulation_name, category FROM regulations WHERE applicable_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE regulation_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, date, change_description FROM regulatory_changes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, regulation_name, category, applicable_date FROM regulations WHERE category = 'Finance';
SELECT company_name, regulation_name, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE regulation_id = 2 AND compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, regulation_name, category, applicable_date FROM regulations ORDER BY applicable_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, regulation_name, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE company_name = 'Company XYZ';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes;
SELECT id, description FROM regulatory_changes WHERE change_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, industry FROM company_data WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM compliance_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT id, requirement FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes WHERE change_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT description FROM regulatory_changes WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT change_date, description FROM regulatory_changes WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM company_data WHERE industry = 'Technology' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, location FROM company_data WHERE industry = 'Finance' AND location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM companies ORDER BY company_id DESC;
SELECT change_description, change_date FROM regulatory_changes WHERE change_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, location FROM companies WHERE industry = 'Finance';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE company_id = 3 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_changes
SELECT company_name, industry FROM companies WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT change_description, change_date FROM regulatory_changes ORDER BY change_date DESC
SELECT company_name, change_description, compliance_status FROM companies INNER JOIN regulatory_history ON companies.company_id = regulatory_history.company_id
SELECT username, email FROM users INNER JOIN companies ON users.company_id = companies.company_id
